00050         double tmin () { return atof (Min[0]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00052         double tmax () { return atof (Max[0]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00054         unsigned tsteps () { return Slider[0]->value (); }
00056         double dt () { return (tmax ()-tmin ())/double (tsteps ()); }
00057 
00059         double umin () { return atof (Min[1]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00061         double umax () { return atof (Max[1]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00063         unsigned usteps () { return Slider[1]->value (); }
00065         double du () { return (umax ()-umin ())/double (usteps ()); }
00066 
00068         double vmin () { return atof (Min[2]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00070         double vmax () { return atof (Max[2]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00072         unsigned vsteps () { return Slider[2]->value (); }
00074         double dv () { return (vmax ()-vmin ())/double (vsteps ()); }
